entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/sap-automation
entry.content: This is the repository supporting the SAP deployment automation framework on Azure

entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-foundation-fabric
entry.content: End-to-end modular samples and landing zones toolkit for Terraform on GCP.

entry.title: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cluster-toolkit
entry.content: Cluster Toolkit is an open-source software offered by Google Cloud which makes it easy for customers to deploy AI/ML and HPC environments on Google Cloud.

entry.title: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/terraform-google-cloud-run
entry.content: Deploys apps to Cloud Run, along with option to map custom domain

entry.title: https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-infrastructure
entry.content: Terraform turnup automation for the EKS Kubernetes clusters that host GOV.UK. See https://github.com/alphagov/govuk-helm-charts for application config.

entry.title: https://github.com/bridgecrewio/terragoat
entry.content: TerraGoat is Bridgecrew's "Vulnerable by Design" Terraform repository. TerraGoat is a learning and training project that demonstrates how common configuration errors can find their way into production cloud environments.

entry.title: https://github.com/btkrausen/hashicorp
entry.content: Random code for HashiCorp related projects, training, etc.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-web-app
entry.content: Terraform module that implements a web app on ECS and supports autoscaling, CI/CD, monitoring, ALB integration, and much more.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
entry.content: Terraform module to configure and provision Datadog monitors, custom RBAC roles with permissions, Datadog synthetic tests, Datadog child organizations, and other Datadog resources from a YAML configuration, complete with automated tests.
